questions.question: What is the primary purpose of large language models like ChatGPT?

To convert it into a chatbot
questions.correct_answer: To improve its accuracy on specific tasks

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a task that can be performed using large language models like ChatGPT?

It is not a part of the training process
questions.correct_answer: It involves using a pre-existing model

options: They allow the model to focus on specific parts of input sequences
questions.correct_answer: They allow the model to focus on specific parts of input sequences

questions.question: What is the main difference between ChatGPT and a traditional rule-based chatbot?
options: ChatGPT uses machine learning to generate responses
questions.correct_answer: ChatGPT uses machine learning to generate responses
